meanings.definition: Opposed to or denying metaphysical concepts or principles.
meanings.sent1: She held an antimetaphysical view on the existence of souls.
meanings.sent2: The scientist's antimetaphysical approach focused solely on observable phenomena.
meanings.sent3: The antimetaphysical philosopher joked that ghosts were just misunderstood gases.
meanings.sent4: Her antimetaphysical stance was like a shield against abstract ideas.
meanings.sent5: The antimetaphysical argument was as clear as a glass of water.

meanings.definition: A person who rejects or opposes metaphysical beliefs or theories.
meanings.sent1: As an antimetaphysical, he questioned the existence of supernatural beings.
meanings.sent2: The antimetaphysical presented logical arguments against spiritual realms.
meanings.sent3: The antimetaphysical in the group always brought a rational perspective to discussions.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like an antimetaphysical beacon of skepticism.
meanings.sent5: The antimetaphysical thinker was as solid as a rock in his convictions.
